Cheuk Yiu Hui

Body as Canvas, Passion as Ink

This project aims to explores the intersection between tattoo art, fandom culture, and emotional healing. Focusing on the skin as a canvas for personal stories, it explores how tattoos express memories, emotions, and identity, particularly within the context of fan admiration.
